Quantum Gis

Qgis is a user friendly Open Source Geographic Information System licensed under the GNU General Public License. Main features: View and overlay vector and raster data in different formats and projections without conversion to an internal or common format. You can use it as GUI for GRASS Gis.

Qgis as Grass GUI

For using Qgis as GRASS GUI, Open a Grass section and type in the Bash terminal 

 qgis &

Grass Lectures

  • Introduction to Quantum Gis: download or VM@: ~/ost4sem/lecture/qgis_intro.pdf
